title: Bug 4971 - Strange 'copy package'
description: When performing the 'copy package' operation in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui, the behavior is strange. Specifically, when selecting xxx as the destination, unexpected results occur. This issue can be reproduced by following the steps below:
SR:
1. Create a new project (e.g., xxx2)
2. Open the Package viewer
3. Select a package in project A
4. From the context menu, choose 'Copy'
5.
